name: xernerx-database
description: An extension for the xernerx framework to easily create and manage data by JSON.
author: Dummi

scripts.start: npm i && npm fund && npm audit fix --force &&  npm link && tsc -w
scripts.patch: git add . && npm run commit && npm version patch && npm publish && git push
scripts.minor: git add . && npm run commit && npm version minor && npm publish && git push
scripts.major: git add . && npm run commit && npm version major && npm publish && git push
